events.message: Some small improvements to release notes

issue.title: `github-merge.py` cannot merge PRs with empty body
issue.body:
While merging https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22921 with `github-merge.py` I got the following error
```
Warning: unable to retrieve pull information from github: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
```
It turns out that when there is no PR body, `rec['body']` is `None`, not the empty string. We should handle this, probably, or at the least give a better error.
